name: My Little Pony: The Cursed Gem
description: Windows installer of the game required

files.installfile: N/A:Select the Windows installer of the game (mlpcgsetup.exe)

task.description: Installing game. Leave everything by default and click 'next, next, next finish'...
task.name: wineexec

content:
exe: drive_c/Program Files/MLP The Cursed Gem/Game.exe
files:
- installfile: N/A:Select the Windows installer of the game (mlpcgsetup.exe)
game:
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_35
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_36
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_42
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx11
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dinput
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dinput8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directmusic
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directplay
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dsound
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dxdiag
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet20
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing game. Leave everything by default and click 'next, next,
      next finish'...
    executable: $installfile
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
